name: Auryn
description: Auryn (AU) is the deployment-sharing and value-accrual token for the Stablenet ecosystem. It is minted directly through the main dApp in exchange for ETH, TitanX, or ORX, and represents a stake in the expansion of independent USDx stablecoin deployments. Auryn connects the long-tail of low to mid-cap crypto assets to a unified MetaStable network, capturing value as new collateral types and communities adopt Stablenetâ€™s stablecoin infrastructure. By acting as the shared token across future deployments, AU aligns ecosystem growth, collateral onboarding, and stablecoin adoption into a single asset.
